name: Ballsy Frolic
description:
This is my first game I ever posted (as well as my first game jam I participated in); it's about a little teleporting dog that enters people's yards to take their toys.

I'm excited to post this after seeing games from previous game jams and wanted to make something similar.

If you want to restart the game, press "R". 

Artist/Musician credit:  https://www.deviantart.com/honorj

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020
